      • setCommsHandler

        public void setCommsHandler(SmartCommsHandler sch)
        Description copied from interface: SmartComThread
        Assign a SmartCommsHandler to handle all received packets. Any packets received before a SmartCommsHandler is associated will be discarded without warning.
        Specified by:
        setCommsHandler in interface SmartComThread
        Parameters:
